articles.title: Virginia Kroger location accidentally gave out empty COVID-19 shots - Fox Business
articles.description: The professional who had administered the blank shots thought that all of the syringes had been properly filled with the vaccine prior to the appointments.
articles.content:
A Kroger's clinic in Virginia mistakenly injected customers with empty syringes Monday rather than giving them the actual COVID-19 vaccine.
